abstract: Cleveland Mayor Frank G Jackson, attempting to tamp down new anger over how city has handled November 2014 fatal police shooting of 12-year-old Tamir Rice, apologizes for language that city’s lawyers used in court filings to assert that boy’s death was his own fault.
lead_paragraph: Mayor Frank G. Jackson apologized on Monday for language that the city’s lawyers used in court filings to assert that the 12-year-old boy’s death was his own fault.

headline.main: Cleveland Mayor Apologizes for Language Used to Blame Tamir Rice for His Death
headline.print_headline: Cleveland Mayor Apologizes for Language Used to Blame Boy for His Death

snippet: Mayor Frank G. Jackson apologized on Monday for language that the city’s lawyers used in court filings to assert that the 12-year-old boy’s death was his own fault.
